text: The student will apply history and social science skills to recognize state and national symbols, including, but not limited to
subject: History & Social Science
subs: locating the Virginia and United States capitals and Capitol buildings;
explaining the meaning behind symbols, including, but not limited to the American flag, bald eagle, Washington Monument, Liberty Bell, and Statue of Liberty; and
learning about the meaning of the American flag and the words chosen in the Pledge of Allegiance and the National Anthem.
